mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM log_log AS ll LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment AS eqi ON ll.`equipment_int` = eqi.`equipment_int` LEFT JOIN eqi_device AS dev ON ll.`device_id` = dev.`device_id` LEFT JOIN cap_user AS cur ON ll.`user_id` = cur.`USER_ID`
ll.log_type = '101'
and eqi.equipment_id like '%${equipmentId}%'
and eqi.equipment_name like '%${equipmentName}%'
and ll.source like '%${source}%'
and cur.USER_NAME like '%${loginUserName}%'
and ll.login_time like '%${loginTime}%'

SELECT eqi.`equipment_id`, eqi.`equipment_name`, dev.`app_id`, ll.`source`, cur.`USER_NAME` AS loginUserName, ll.`login_time` FROM log_log AS ll LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment AS eqi ON ll.`equipment_int` = eqi.`equipment_int` LEFT JOIN eqi_device AS dev ON ll.`device_id` = dev.`device_id` LEFT JOIN cap_user AS cur ON ll.`user_id` = cur.`USER_ID`
ll.log_type = '101'
and eqi.equipment_id like '%${equipmentId}%'
and eqi.equipment_name like '%${equipmentName}%'
and ll.source like '%${source}%'
and cur.USER_NAME like '%${loginUserName}%'
and ll.login_time like '%${loginTime}%'
order by ${field} ${order}
limit ${begin},${limit}
